title: Delhi 6 | Video Jukebox | A.R. Rahman | Abhishek Bachchan | Sonam Kapoor | Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra
video_description:
Presenting the video jukebox of Bollywood movie Delhi 6 featuring Abhishek Bachchan & Sonam Kapoor. The music of Bollywood movie is given by A.R. Rahman while songs are written by Prasoon Joshi. The movie is directed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra; Produced by Ronnie Screwvala & Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra. Enjoy and stay connected with us !!

title: Sayonee - Official Trailer | Tanmay Ssingh | Musskan S | Rahul Roy | 18th December 2020
video_description:
Love demands a lot from you. Sometimes, it demands you to go to the edge of the world. Sayonee, a musical action thriller starring Tanmay Ssingh and Musskan Sethi promises to keep you glued to the edge of your seats with high octane action and drama.

Releasing in theatres on 18th December 2020
#SAYONEE #SayoneeTrailer #TanmaySsingh

title: Chhalaang: Care Ni Karda (Lyrical) Rajkummar R, Nushrratt B | Yo Yo Honey Singh, Alfaaz, Hommie D
video_description:
Gulshan Kumar & T-Series Films present, LYRICAL VIDEO of song "Care Ni Karda" from bollywood movie  Chhalaang starring Rajkummar Rao & Nushrratt Bharuccha. The film is written by Luv Ranjan, Aseem Arrora & Zeishan Quadri, it is directed by Hansal Mehta, produced by Ajay Devgn, Luv Ranjan & Ankur Garg, and presented by Bhushan Kumar.  

Chhalaang is slated to release on Amazon Prime Video, this Diwali, Nov 13.

Chhalaang is a hilarious, yet inspirational journey of a PT Master from a semi government funded school in Northern India. Montu (Rajkummar Rao) is a typical PT Master for whom it’s just a job. When circumstances put everything that Montu cares for at stake, including Neelu (Nushrratt Bharuccha) who he loves, Montu is forced to do what he has never done - Teach. Through Montu’s journey, Chhalaang humorously addresses the value of Sports Education in the school curriculum.

♪Stream the Full Song Here♪
